title: Andreessen, Coinbase Directors Face Trading Suit for Now
description: A Delaware judge ruled that a shareholder lawsuit alleging insider trading by several directors of Coinbase Global Inc., including venture capitalist Marc Andreessen, can proceed for now after an internal investigation cleared the defendants of wrongdoing.
content: A Delaware judge ruled that a shareholder lawsuit alleging insider trading by several directors of Coinbase Global Inc., including venture capitalist Marc Andreessen, can proceed for now after an internal investigation cleared the defendants of wrongdoing.
